patch 8.0.0072
Problem:    MS-Windows: Crash with long font name. (Henry Hu)
Solution:   Fix comparing with LF_FACESIZE. (Ken Takata, closes #1243)

patch 8.0.0072
Problem:    MS-Windows: Crash with long font name. (Henry Hu)
Solution:   Fix comparing with LF_FACESIZE. (Ken Takata, closes #1243)

patch 8.0.0073
Problem:    More comparisons between firstwin and lastwin.
Solution:   Use ONE_WINDOW for consistency. (Hirohito Higashi)

patch 8.0.0073
Problem:    More comparisons between firstwin and lastwin.
Solution:   Use ONE_WINDOW for consistency. (Hirohito Higashi)

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0074
Problem:    Cannot make Vim fail on an internal error.
Solution:   Add IEMSG() and IEMSG2(). (Domenique Pelle)  Avoid reporting an
            internal error without mentioning where.
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0074
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0074
Problem:    Cannot make Vim fail on an internal error.
Solution:   Add IEMSG() and IEMSG2(). (Domenique Pelle)  Avoid reporting an
            internal error without mentioning where.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0075
Problem:    Using number for exception type lacks type checking.
Solution:   Use an enum.
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0075
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0075
Problem:    Using number for exception type lacks type checking.
Solution:   Use an enum.
